guide.introduction_rendered:
Relevant parts
  • Articulating lamp from Lowes or Home Depot, mobile speaker, zip ties, two L-brackets, a few assorted screws and bolts from the junk drawer
Tools
  • Pliers, screw drivers...standard hand tools

parts.text: Articulating lamp from Lowes or Home Depot, mobile speaker, zip ties, two L-brackets, a few assorted screws and bolts from the junk drawer

guide.summary: This project converts a cheap articulating lamp mount to a movable speaker holder.  I use this for monitoring ham radio communications as well as SDR signals into the computer.
guide.title: "Floating" Speaker - Articulating Arm
